biweekly.property

Class DisplayAlarm

  • java.lang.Object
    • biweekly.property.ICalProperty
      • biweekly.property.VCalAlarmProperty
        • biweekly.property.DisplayAlarm

  • public class DisplayAlarm
extends VCalAlarmProperty
    Defines an alarm that displays a message when triggered. It is recommended that the VAlarm component be used to created alarms.
    Author:
    Michael Angstadt
    See Also:
    vCal 1.0 p.30, VAlarm.display(biweekly.property.Trigger, java.lang.String)
